Visit Cart Close Cart Outdoor Kitchens in Wellington, FL – BBQ Grills & Fire Pits Wellington, FL 2535 FL-7, Suite 140 Wellington, Florida, 33414, United States 561-593-4101 sales@paradisegrills.com Mon 10:00 AM - 07:00 PM Tues 10:00 AM - 07:00 PM Wed 10:00 AM - 07:00 PM Thur 10:00 AM - 07:00 PM Fri 10:00 AM - 07:00 PM Sat 10:00 AM - 07:00 PM Sun 10:00 AM - 06:00 PM Florida Directions (opens in a new tab) Details (opens in a new tab) Paradise Grills: Outdoor Kitchens in Wellington, FL Just west of West Palm Beach is Wellington’s premier South Florida community, known for attractive neighborhoods, plentiful parks, quality schools, and plenty of equestrian interests. This once fertile farmland is the perfect area to build your backyard dream kitchen! With the addition of a new store, everyone close to Wellington can now enjoy their very own premier outdoor kitchen in their backyard. When you stop by our spectacular showroom of outdoor kitchens in tropical Wellington, you’ll be amazed at our sophisticated outdoor kitchen selection. Our Flexbuild Series system easily allows our customers to create the outdoor kitchen of their dreams. Uniquely one that fits their space, style, and entertainment desires. During your visit to the showroom, check out our premier Flexbuild system and create a one-of-a-kind, fully functional, and amazing outdoor kitchen in Wellington, Florida. Pick from our best-selling grill islands and fantastic bar systems in order to create a specialized combination to fit your style and budget. View fullscreen View fullscreen View fullscreen 1 1 Our Unbeatable Expertise Over the course of 12 years, we have honed our skills and perfected our products. Paradise Grills Wellington manufactures the most robust grills manufactured with the highest quality for your outdoor kitchen paradise. We are incredibly proud to share our products with the citizens in and around Wellington, Florida! Our friendly team of experts is waiting to help you design the perfect customizable outdoor kitchen haven to your specifications. They will gladly answer your questions and give you the best advice with their 12 years of building experience, creating thousands of the perfect outdoor grilling oasis. At Paradise Grills, each of our employees takes satisfaction to make this process run smoothly from beginning to end. Starting the process, choose a unit from our selection that best fits your backyard space, then add upgrades. Afterward, our knowledgeable staff will handle the rest. The design dream team will show you how to create your backyard entertaining oasis as easily as 1, 2, 3. Within our outdoor kitchen selection, we have just the perfect setup to fit your budget and style requirements. Don’t let finances stop you from owning your dream kitchen paradise! We have special financing options available to fit every budget. Come visit our showroom today to see our outdoor kitchens in Wellington, Florida! Custom Outdoor Kitchens in Wellington, FL Build your customizable outdoor kitchen today by stopping into our Wellington, Florida showroom, and speaking with our friendly and knowledgeable staff members. We are ready to answer any questions you may have and can help you in selecting the perfect outdoor kitchen for your outdoor living space. There’s nothing better than building your backyard oasis with industry experts. Here at Paradise Grills we take pride in making the process easy from start to finish. Select the unit that fits best for your backyard space, add any additional upgrades you desire, and we’ll take care of the rest. Let us show you how we can transform your backyard into your very own paradise. We have an outdoor kitchen for every style and budget. Ask about our special financing too. So what are you waiting for? Please stop by our Paradise Grills showroom and see our outdoor kitchens in Wellington, Florida today! BUILD YOUR OUTDOOR KITCHEN TODAY Paradise Grills Exclusive Flexbuild Series For Outdoor Kitchens in Wellington, Florida. With Paradise Grills’ Wellington, Florida’s unmatched Flexbuild Series system, everyone can make the ultimate outdoor kitchen paradise that suits their needs and looks stylish! If you want grilling options, we have you covered! First, pick one of five options in the Flexbuild system. Next, please choose from the many different Island bar systems that we offer to create a fully functional and sophisticated outdoor kitchen in Wellington, Florida. Upgrade the grill to a GSL-32 Professional, HSL-32 Hibachi, or even a CSL-32 Cocktail station with our Flexbuild system. Take a closer look at our top bar and grill systems that feature our one-of-a-kind Islands of Paradise Flexbuild Series: Islands of Paradise Grill Islands Paradise GX3 Starting with the small but mighty compact GX3. The GX3 island includes our exclusive GS-32 Premium Grill plus a stainless-steel access door, a stucco bottom, and a nearly indestructible Avellaero Stone Countertop. Paradise GX4 / GX5 Our GX4/GX5 grill islands give you more countertop space for your culinary creations. There’s ample room on this countertop to include a double-side burner. In addition, this island includes our exclusive GS-32 Premium Grill plus a stainless-steel access door, a stucco bottom, and a nearly indestructible Avellaero Stone Countertop. Paradise GX6 / GX7 / GX8 Need more space for your guests? You’ll love this model! Add a Paradise Grills’ double-sized burner and a Paradise Wine Refrigerator to create a fantastic entertaining area! In addition, this island includes our exclusive GS-32 Premium Grill plus a stainless-steel access door, a stucco bottom, and a nearly indestructible Avellaero Stone Countertop. Paradise GX9 / GX10 To utilize your Villages backyard to its full potential, pick this grill island with its spacious countertop. Add-ons include a Paradise Wine or Bar Refrigerator, a durable double-sided burner, or any of our additional stainless-steel appliances. This island includes our exclusive GS-32 Premium Grill, a stainless-steel access door, a stucco bottom, and a nearly indestructible Avellaero Stone Countertop. Paradise GX12 / GX14 Easily entertain a large crowd with Paradises’ most extensive island option! Pair this island with Paradise Grills Paradise Bar or Wine Refrigerator, a double-side sink or burner, or any of our other stainless steel appliances! This kitchen island includes our exclusive GS-32 Premium Grill, a stainless-steel access door, a stucco bottom, and a nearly indestructible Avellaero Stone Countertop. Our knowledgeable experts are standing by to answer all of your concerns and questions you may have about building your perfect oasis. They will also help you select the ideal Wellington outdoor kitchen accessories. As always, all of our Paradise Grills outdoor kitchens and grilling systems are 100% customizable. Don’t see what you are looking for? Just ask us. We don’t mind! Our island systems also can be paired with our grilling systems as part of the exclusive Flexbuild system. So go browse our entire selection of bar systems with 100% perfect confidence! The Wellington Island Bar Paradise Grills is proud to carry six unique island systems that our customers can use as the base to design the Wellington outdoor kitchen they’ve always imagined. Design the perfect atmosphere for your outdoor entertaining with our bar systems. When planning your outdoor entertainment space, consider the size of the crowd, style, and budget when choosing from our spectacular lineup of bar systems. Our industry-leading systems are the absolute best way to create the most relaxing space for all your entertaining needs. Paradise Grills’ bar systems make everyone in The Wellington feel as though they are living in paradise: Aruba (6/8) Bring Aruba to your backyard with this ultra-luxurious island bar. Our Aruba bar is created with LED lighting, a sturdy professional grill, stereo options, and top-grade commercial appliances, all with plenty of seating! Use the Paradise Your Way configurator to enjoy the beautiful tropics from your Wellington backyard. St. Croix (8/9) The sophisticated design of the St. Croix island bar will create the perfect tropical vibe in your backyard. Perfect for entertaining, this bar is designed with ample space and relaxation in mind. You can get yours with a choice of entertainment and professional grilling combinations. Combine the St. Croix with any grill island in our Flexbuild System! St. Thomas (7/9) Imagine enjoying your beautiful backyard paradise seating ten guests around our St. Thomas island bar. When you design your island bar in our Flexbuild System, the sky is the limit with our selection of entertainment options and professional appliances. In addition, our Paradise Your Way system delivers a tropical island feel to your backyard! Maui (10/12/14) If you want the ultimate luau party, pick the Maui! This modern and exquisite island bar features plenty of seating, a marine-grade stereo system, LED lighting, and various grilling options. The “U” shaped island bar design makes the Maui the ultimate backyard experience with unlimited possibilities, all built with our Paradise Your Way! Fire Island and Patio Our free, downloadable Happy Hour app will effortlessly control all Paradise Grills fire pits. Each fire pit features almost indestructible fire glass, 304 commercial stainless steel, and LED color-changing lights. So relax and kick your feet up on our premium patio furniture constructed with quality materials. Fall head over heels in love with our high-end sunbrella fabric that is part of the adjustable sofa backrest. And as always, every piece of furniture is created just the way you want and built with our Paradise Your Way system! Click here to see our Complete List of Island Bars Shades of Paradise Premium Island Outdoor Kitchen Models Tahiti Create the ideal island life vibe in your backyard with our Tahiti island bar. In combination with our one-of-a-kind, patent-pending tiki hut, enjoy this unit’s easy assembling and disassembling. The Tahiti is not only strong but gorgeous! The durable galvanized steel tubing provides strength and stability as it’s hidden inside hand-carved tiki poles. As a bonus, the bar comes with a motorized tv, LED lighting, a stereo speaker system, a commercial stainless-steel footrest bar rail, and your choice of Paradise Professional grilling options. So, don’t delay! Visit our location today to have the Paradise Grills Tahiti for your backyard! Make your wildest dreams come true with Paradise Your Way! Abaco Are you looking for the ultimate tropical experience? Then, you’ll want to check out the Paradise Grills Abaco! This beauty boasts professional appliances, a giant 16 x 18 Abaco tiki hut, a dual motorized smart tv system, and a marine-grade stereo system to entertain up to 22 guests! So take your pick from a refrigerator, wine cooler, cocktail station, or hibachi grill. Every one of our appliances is designed with our Paradise Your Way system! Monaco Or choose the Paradise Grills Monaco with its elegant pergola giving you plenty of shade. This one-of-a-kind design from “Shades of Paradise,” is absolute outdoor kitchen perfection! It’s roomy enough to hold each of our professional appliances. It has a maximum seating allotment plus entertainment options, including a motorized 70-inch tv, LED lighting, a marine stereo system, and more. It’s the best modern outdoor modern bar system built with our Paradise Your Way system! Click here to see our Complete List of Shades of Paradise View fullscreen View fullscreen View fullscreen 1 1 Why Choose Paradise Grills in The Wellington? Why throw your hard-earned money away year after year by buying a cheap grill? Instead, invest in the ultimate outdoor kitchen in The Villages, Florida, that’s guaranteed to be used for years and years. Our financing options make it easy to own a slice of paradise from Paradise Grills! We take pride in being the most educated in our industry at Paradise Grills. We hope you will allow us the opportunity to custom-make a backyard that fits your style, budget, and needs. Come talk to us about our terrific financing options when you visit our fabulous showroom to find your new outdoor kitchen in The Wellington! Here are some reasons why you make the best decisions when purchasing a backyard kitchen from Paradise Grills. Paradise Grills’ Welded Aluminum Frames To begin, our nearly indestructible aluminum frames are firmly welded. This differs from our competitors’ screwed frames currently on the market. They don’t come close in comparison! Additionally, our frames have a lifetime guarantee on the grill’s structure. Paradise Grills’ Flexbuild Series Paradise Grills puts our clients in control with the innovative Flexbuild system. This system gives every customer the power to design a personalized outdoor kitchen. Our system can adjust size and seating requirements, plus allow additional upgrades that suit your backyard needs. Paradise Grills’ GSL-32 Professional Grill Paradise’s GSL-32 Professional Grill has leveled the outdoor grilling competition. Our close-to-indestructible professional grill is designed with 304 commercial-grade stainless steel and has LED lighting. Additional upgrades to this grill include an infrared sear station, a rotisserie griddle insert, and an exclusive wood chip smoker box. Plug N Play Electrical System Please don’t bother with paying an electrician with our exclusive plug-n-play system. While other companies cut costs with poor indoor-rated electrical systems outdoors, our designs are perfectly designed and rated for outdoor use. So there’s never a need to be concerned about electrocution or shortage. Just plug in and play! Happy Hour App Create the perfect ambiance with our color-changing LED Lights. Add a new dimension and atmosphere to your outdoor kitchens in The Wellington, Florida. These LED lights can be easily controlled with our free Happy Hour App. This unique app is available for download from the Google Play or Apple stores. Paradise Grills’ Oversize 304 Stainless-Steel Footrest Your comfort is our priority at Paradise Grills. Keeping this in mind, we have designed oversized footrests for each island. Our robust stainless-steel footrest will give every one of your guests improved ergonomics and support. At Paradise Grills, we never cut corners when it comes to comfort! Paradise Grills’ Tiki Hut Add the perfect touch of paradise with our exclusive tiki huts. Our sturdy frames are five times stronger than our competitors’ wood-framed models. Plus, the setup and takedown of our tiki huts are as easy as 1,2,3! Paradise Grills is America’s LARGEST Outdoor Kitchen Manufacturer. Experience matters in Wellington when designing your dream outdoor kitchen. For over 12 years, we have been America’s largest and most knowledgeable outdoor kitchen manufacturer. So enjoy peace of mind knowing you are purchasing the most substantial and luxurious outdoor kitchen in the industry when you purchase from Paradise. Why Paradise Grills Is The Very Best Option For Your Outdoor Kitchen We carry a wide range of products for your outdoor kitchen at Paradise Grills. You’ll find something to match your style and budget, from barbecue grills, fire pits and fireplaces. Additionally, our products deliver a one-of-a-kind entertainment environment that will have you and your guests experiencing paradise! At Paradise Grills, we make owning an outdoor, entertaining paradise accessible by providing the perfect environment to host a family gathering or a neighborhood bash! With our exclusive plug-n-play system, cooling options, LED lighting system, TV/DVD package, wine and liquor cabinet, stainless steel drawers and sinks, spacious countertops, plus exclusive umbrellas and tiki huts, your outdoor space will have a sophisticated aesthetic appeal while still maintaining full functionality. So, visit to see our amazing outdoor kitchens. Drop by our impressive showroom and view the amazing selection of outdoor kitchens in The Villages. Our friendly and experienced staff members will answer all your questions while you tour our Paradise-exclusive outdoor kitchens. In our Flexbuild System, we will make the process pain-free with the ability to customize your upscale The Villages outdoor kitchen.
